tutorial.evaluation_step1_desc: FACE 5 MORAL DILEMMAS. EVALUATION ACROSS 6 VALUES: EMPATHY, INTEGRITY, RESPONSIBILITY, JUSTICE, ALTRUISM, HONESTY.
tutorial.evaluation_step2_desc: READ EACH DILEMMA. CHOOSE BETWEEN TWO OPTIONS. NO RIGHT ANSWERS. ONLY REFLECTIONS OF YOUR MORAL VALUES.
tutorial.evaluation_step3_desc: AFTER YOUR CHOICE, SEE HOW OTHERS RESPONDED. COMPARE YOUR MORAL REASONING WITH THE COMMUNITY.
tutorial.evaluation_step4_desc: AFTER 5 DILEMMAS, VIEW YOUR MORAL PROFILE. SEE WHICH VALUES GUIDE YOUR DECISION-MAKING.
tutorial.infinite_step1_desc: A MODE TO DISCOVER WHO THE PEOPLE AROUND YOU REALLY ARE. MASKS FALL. SOULS ARE REVEALED.
tutorial.infinite_step2_desc: IMPOSSIBLE MORAL CHOICES. NO RIGHT ANSWER. JUST YOU AND YOUR SCREAMING CONSCIENCE.
tutorial.infinite_step3_desc: WATCH YOUR FRIENDS STRUGGLE WITH THEIR MORALITY. PASS THE PHONE. NO ONE LEAVES UNSCATHED.
tutorial.story_step1_desc: EVERY DECISION LEADS YOU DOWN A DIFFERENT PATH. YOUR CHOICES SHAPE YOUR STORY. THERE'S NO GOING BACK.
tutorial.story_step2_desc: A TREE OF MORAL DECISIONS. EACH CHOICE OPENS NEW PATHS. CLOSES OTHERS FOREVER. YOUR DESTINY IS IN YOUR HANDS.
tutorial.story_step3_desc: 5 LEVELS OF DEPTH. PREVIOUS CHOICES WEIGH ON FUTURE ONES. IN THE END, YOU'LL SEE WHO YOU REALLY ARE.
